name: CATARACT_PLANNING_IMPLANT
description: This table contains information about the lens that was implanted as part of cataract surgery.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OPH_CAT_LENS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Implanted lens type for cataract surgery

columns.name: OPH_LENS_IMP_CMT
columns.description: Comments for the implanted intraocular lens

columns.name: OPH_LENS_IMP_SUP_ID
columns.description: Stores the supply record entered into the implanted lens portion of cataract planning.

columns.name: OPH_LENS_IMP_SUP_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.
